propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component. To learn how to add your own colors, check out Themed components—Extend colors.
propDescriptions.defaultChecked: The default checked state. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.endDecorator: The element that appears at the end of the switch.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the state is changed.

Signature:
function(event: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new value by accessing event.target.value (string). You can pull out the new checked state by accessing event.target.checked (boolean).
propDescriptions.readOnly: If true, the component is read only.
propDescriptions.size: The size of the component. To learn how to add custom sizes to the component, check out Themed components—Extend sizes.
propDescriptions.startDecorator: The element that appears at the end of the switch.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.variant: The global variant to use. To learn how to add your own variants, check out Themed components—Extend variants.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.thumb: The component that renders the thumb.
slotDescriptions.action: The component that renders the action.
slotDescriptions.input: The component that renders the input.
slotDescriptions.track: The component that renders the track.
slotDescriptions.startDecorator: The component that renders the start decorator.
slotDescriptions.endDecorator: The component that renders the end decorator.
